channel.title: CVE Feed for LocalServer -- LocalServer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LocalServer -- LocalServer

item.title: CVE-2024-10288|2024-10-23T12:59:41.430Z -- localserver -- localserver
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability affecting LocalServer 1.0.9 that could allow a remote user to send a specially crafted query to an authenticated user and steal their session details through /mlss/SubscribeToList, parameter ListName.

item.title: CVE-2024-10286|2024-10-23T13:00:28.820Z -- localserver -- localserver
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability affecting LocalServer 1.0.9 that could allow a remote user to send a specially crafted query to an authenticated user and steal their session details through /testmail/index.php, parameter to.

item.title: CVE-2024-10287|2024-10-23T13:00:10.603Z -- localserver -- localserver
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability affecting LocalServer 1.0.9 that could allow a remote user to send a specially crafted query to an authenticated user and steal their session details through /mlss/ForgotPassword, parameter ListName.

item.title: CVE-2024-10289|2024-10-23T12:59:03.838Z -- localserver -- localserver
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability affecting LocalServer 1.0.9 that could allow a remote user to send a specially crafted query to an authenticated user and steal their session details through /mlss/ManageSubscription, parameter MSubListName.
